title: RP codes
body: my friend thought it would be funny to spam a bunch of numbers in my code redeem bar for RP giftcards.. and i have one but it says i have to wait to attempt it again.. how long is the waiting period?

replies.body: Per the [RP Purchase ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224)guide, you may have to wait 24 hours before submitting another RP Code.  Whatt your friends did is pretty trolly, but on a serious note, it's also super risky.  Definitely log out or lock your computer if you're going to be AFK, and [keep your account info safe](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) and to yourself!
